The teacher suddenly realized his enlightenment.
He crossed the river and went across.
He didn't cross the river again.
He then returned to Gaojeong and stayed there.
He took over the Dharma from Deshan.
Jingshan Shining Cloud.
"Gaojeong crossed the river and left.
Perhaps you're a monk of Sālêndra.
If you want to be the Dharma heir of Deshan.
That's not possible.
Why is that?
He's still across the river from him.
As the old virtue verse says.
'Deok-suk has this array of goods stuck in him.
How often did he fail to conceal it from others?
It's fortunate that the high pavilion is a miserable place to live.
The other side of the river is defiled for no good reason.
Seon Master Guang Deyi.
The monks asked what happens when a long-suffering person doesn't meet.
The master said.
'When the door is open, people don't meet him.
There's nothing in the humble alley that can be collected.
Danxia Chun's verse said.
"The marvelous essence of the hall is fully proportioned.
He steps alone on the golden lotus in the blue sky.
He's still sitting lazily on the thousand-flower dais.
How could he be willing to wear a tattered gown?
"The Zen master Huai of the celestial garments.
The monk asked what happened to the ancient mirror when it was still unpolished.
The master said, "It was propped up against the sky and supported the ground.
He asked what happened to it after it was polished.
The teacher said, "I'll hide myself quickly in the shadow of the setting sun.
Song source Yue's verse said.
'Stand on the ground, support the sky, and combine body and function.'
He doesn't hide himself in the shadow of the setting sun.
There's a time when I'm sitting alone at the top of a lonely peak.
In the stillness, he still hears the frequent falling of leaves.
